ing: 2 cups pitted tart cherries (such as Door County cherries)
1/3 cup white sugar, or to taste
des: "A fun way to make your own cherry-infused liquor dessert drink. Tart cherries are the real 'star' of this recipe. Warning: The cherries are very strong after a few months, so eat responsibly. Serve over ice with Sierra MistÂ® or SpriteÂ® to cut liquor strength."
ins:
Put cherries in a clean, 1-quart glass jar; add sugar. Fill the rest of the jar with vodka. Place lid on jar and shake.
Store jar in a cool, dark area for 1 to 4 months, shaking jar occasionally.
